scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run compile
scripts.test: tsc --project tsconfig.test.json && NODE_OPTIONS='--import tsx' mocha tests/**/*.ts
scripts.test:debug: tsc --project tsconfig.test.json && NODE_OPTIONS='--import tsx' mocha --inspect-brk tests/**/*.ts
scripts.compile:types: tsx scripts/generate.ts > src/specification.ts && npx prettier src/specification.ts --write
scripts.compile: rm -rf dist && npm run compile:types && tsc
